1.name: Broken Blossoms or The Yellow Man and the Girl
1.description: A frail waif, abused by her brutal boxer father in London's seedy Limehouse District, is befriended by a sensitive Chinese immigrant with tragic consequences.

2.name: J'accuse
2.description: The story of two men, one married, the other the lover of the other's wife, who meet in the trenches of the First World War, and how their tale becomes a microcosm for the horrors of war.

3.name: Dalagang bukid
3.description: This is the first Filipino feature-length film made by a Filipino director regarded as "Father of Filipino Movies" and is now lost forever. Dalagang Bukid is a story about a young flower ...                See full summary »

4.name: Anders als die Andern
4.description: Two male musicians fall in love, but blackmail and scandal makes the affair take a tragic turn.

5.name: Anne of Green Gables
5.description: Anne Shirley, an orphan, is taken into the lives of a generous farmer and his sister. She grows from an adventuresome young lass into a charming and much sought-after young lady.

6.name: True Heart Susie
6.description: Susie, a plain young country girl, secretly loves a neighbor boy, William. She believes in him and sacrifices much of her own happiness to promote his own ambitions, all without his ...                See full summary »

7.name: Male and Female
7.description: Lady Mary Lasenby is a spoiled maiden who always gets her way until shipwrecked with her butler, then learns which qualities are really admirable in a person.

8.name: Ravished Armenia
8.description: Aurora Mardiganian, a young and beautiful Armenian girl, lives with her parents in the Turkish city of Harpoot. Her father, a prosperous merchant, was preparing to send her to the West to ...                See full summary »

9.name: Die Puppe
9.description: Because the Baron of Chanterelle wants to preserve his family line, he forces his timid nephew Lancelot to choose one of the village maidens to wed. Lancelot flees to a monastery to escape ...                See full summary »

10.name: Madame DuBarry
10.description: The story of Madame DuBarry, the mistress of Louis XV of France, and her loves in the time of the French revolution.

11.name: Die Spinnen, 1. Teil - Der Goldene See
11.description: Kay Hoog finds a message that indicates that some Incas are still alive, but the secret organisation "Die Spinnen" wants the Incas' gold....

12.name: The Sentimental Bloke
12.description: A down-at-heal ex-convict undergoes an epiphany as he experiences the love of a good woman for the first time.

13.name: Herr Arnes pengar
13.description: Three Scottish officers, including Sir Archi, murder Sir Arne and his household for a coffin filled with gold. The only survivor is Elsalill, who moves to relatives in Marstrand. There she ...                See full summary »

14.name: Die Austernprinzessin
14.description: An American heiress seeks the hand of an impoverished German prince.

15.name: Harakiri
15.description: The Buddhist priest wants the Daughter of the Daimyo to become a priestess at the Forbidden Garden. The Daimyo thinks if he were in Europe that his daughter should decide on her own, but he...                See full summary »

16.name: Sången om den eldröda blomman
16.description: Olof Koskela is the son of a rich farmer. He seduces young girls at random, until an inconsistent gesture rushes him away from home and his carefree lifestyle. Based on the 1905 novel by Finnish author Johannes Linnankoski.

17.name: Unheimliche Geschichten
17.description: A demon, a reaper, and the ghost of a prostitute read gothic short stories and act them out.

18.name: The Masked Rider
18.description: This surprisingly violent 15-episode serial takes place on the border between Texas and Mexico. When warned by Captain Jack of the Texas Rangers of impending trouble, elderly rancher Bill ...                See full summary »

19.name: Daddy-Long-Legs
19.description: An orphan discovers that she has an anonymous benefactor who is willing to pay her college tuition, unaware he's the same man who has been romantically pursuing her.

20.name: Don't Change Your Husband
20.description: Leila Porter comes to dislike her husband James, a glue king who is always eating onions and looking sloppy. But after she divorces him and marries two-timing playboy Schuyler Van Sutphen the now-reformed James looks pretty good.

22.name: The Miracle Man
22.description: A gang of crooks evade the police by moving their operations to a small town. There the gang's leader encounters a faith healer and uses him to scam gullible public of funds for a supposed ...                See full summary »

23.name: The First Men in the Moon
23.description: The inventor of a space sphere flies to the moon and is marooned by a crooked financier.

25.name: Wagon Tracks
25.description: Buckskin Hamilton guides a wagon train across the wasteland, caring well for the pioneers he escorts, but hoping to solve the murder of his brother by one of the travellers.

26.name: Back to God's Country
26.description: A woman finds herself all alone in a remote harbor with the man responsible for the murder of her father. With seemingly nobody around to protect her, she has to be resourceful.

27.name: Blind Husbands
27.description: An Austrian officer sets out to seduce a neglected young wife.

29.name: The Lost Battalion
29.description: A battalion of the U.S. Army's 77th Division penetrates deep into the Argonne Forest of France during the First World War. The battalion becomes surrounded and holds out for six long days, ...                See full summary »

30.name: The Grim Game
30.description: Jailed unjustly for a murder he did not commit, a young man uses his amazing powers of escape to free himself and pursue the actual killers, who hold his fiancée captive.

31.name: Præsidenten
31.description: The judge in a Danish town sees his illegitimate daughter facing a trial for the murder of her newborn child, and is rather sure that she will be sentenced to death. She became pregnant ...                See full summary »

32.name: Die Herrin der Welt 1. Teil - Die Freundin des gelben Mannes
32.description: Maud Gregaards travels to China in search of a fabled treasure said to have belonged to the Queen of Sheba. Once there, she is taken captive by an evil man and nearly killed in the belief she is a witch.

33.name: Az aranyember
33.description: The adventures of captain Mihály Tímár, who aids a persecuted Turkish Pasha and his daughter in their escape across the Donau. After the Pasha dies, the captain acquires his fortune and ...                See full summary »

34.name: Deliverance
34.description: The true story of Helen Keller, who lost her vision and hearing at the age of two, was considered a hopeless case, but who through the diligent aid of teacher Anne Sullivan became a ...                See full summary »

35.name: Behind the Door
35.description: A German-American naval officer takes revenge against the German submarine commander who brutalized his wife.

36.name: Halbblut
36.description: The story of a man destroyed by love.

37.name: When the Clouds Roll by
37.description: Psychiatrist Dr. Ulrich Metz attempts to drive Daniel Brown to suicide.

38.name: The Darkest Hour
38.description: Wealhy New Yorker Peter Schuyler has a best friend in Lee Austin--so he thinks. Actually, Austin and Marion Dinsmore have a scheme whereby Marion marries Schuyler, then divorces him, gets a...                See full summary »

39.name: The Hoodlum
39.description: A spoiled young rich girl is forced by misfortune to fight for survival in the slums and alleys, where she becomes involved with all manner of unpleasantness.

40.name: The Lightning Raider
40.description: A beautiful young woman is a daring master thief. She meets the young millionaire Thomas Babbington Norton, while fleeing from the scene of her latest theft.

41.name: A Romance of Happy Valley
41.description: John Logan leaves his parents and sweetheart in bucolic Happy Valley to make his fortune in the city. Those he left behind become miserable and beleaguered in his absence, but after several...                See full summary »

42.name: Der Knabe in Blau
42.description: Thomas von Weerth lives as the last descendant of an aristocratic family in the decayed castle. He is fascinated by the picture, 'The Boy in Blue', which shows the so-called Death Emerald.

43.name: Atonement
43.description: Young Laura Hamilton turns down a marriage proposal from Vincent Carlson and marries Theodore Proctor, a bank president. Proctor's financially strapped brother asks him for help, and he has...                See full summary »

45.name: Victory
45.description: Axel Heyst, an uncommitted wanderer, has settled on an island in the South Seas. He takes pity on a troubled young woman, Lena, and gives her refuge on her island. But the piratical Mr. ...                See full summary »

46.name: The Mother and the Law
46.description: A re-edited version of the 'modern' story from Intolerance: Love's Struggle Throughout the Ages (1916).

47.name: Hemsöborna
47.description: The widow Anna Eva Flod at Hemsö needs help on the farm and hire the new boy Carlsson.

48.name: Meyer aus Berlin
48.description: A bumbling, self-indulgent husband goes on a vacation away from his wife. There he meets a popular, attractive young woman also on a vacation. Both go on a mountain climb which is going to be far from an ideal adventure.

49.name: La cigarette
49.description: A Parisian museum director believes his wife has lost interest in him and so places a poisoned cigarette in the box on his desk - thus allowing chance to decide the moment of his death.

50.name: Der Herr der Liebe
50.description: Residing in a castle in the Carpathian Mountains, Hungarian nobleman Vasile Disecu becomes infatuated with Suzette, the daughter of his neighbor. He mistakes Stefana, a maid who is secretly in love with him.
